availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Martha Ann Barnes on August 3, 1837. Father of Mahaley Halstead and Mary Ann Halstead. Married to Sarah Jane Malacia Boyd on February 17, 1842. Father of James Wylie Halstead. Election judge for Precinct No. 2 with Thomas Groom.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston, Division 3, p. 123. Find A Grave, “Charles Grimes Halstead (December 4, 1812-October 9, 1894),” Memorial #47098227, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=47098227 (accessed June 4, 2017).
